page.title: 11Religion Magor Church
page.content: The church is very old and is huge and beautiful. The church door has a font near it. Mr Cobb our vicar stands on the stone next to the font and baptises children.In the church there are lots of interesting things to see. The chancel is where the bells are. The choir sit in the chancel. The east Window is a curved shape and is made of coloured glass. The east window tells the story of Abraham and Isaac where Abraham was about to sacrifice his only son Isaac.Inside the church we sing to God and pray to God. The church has a weather vane to tell which way the wind is blowing. Out side the church there are lots of grandfathers that have died.
